channel.title: [PI] Spawn Server Help
channel.description: Someone please help me! No one has even told me anything that makes sense yet :confused: I am trying to turn my 317 PI server into a spawn, master, and setlevel server. I have been told to change the player rights from 2 to 0 but there is no "playerights >=(?)" after ifcommandequals"item". I really need to know how to make it a spawn server asap! I will rep if your instructions work!

item.title: [PI] Spawn Server Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:5, topic:399900”]After Adding that under the public void for players i removed the public for the donators entierly but now im getting an error for my master command stating

src\server\model\players\packets\commands.java:147 incombatible types
Found :int
Required :int[]
c.playerLevel =99;

and saying the same for the
found :int
required :int[]
c.playerXp = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100)

any ideas
[/quote]

playerLevel and playerXp are int[]s. Not ints.

Read full topic

add back in the donators commands…
or just try this

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights >= 3) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); } }

item.title: [PI] Spawn Server Help
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 0) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

                            }
                    }

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”)) {
for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}

}

public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
{

}
}

Read full topic
